Yes, to be honest, if you think you don't have to learn anymore, then please retire as a manager, because then you're not good enough anymore. So I'm there each and every day with

I spoke a lot about you always want to be ahead of the wave.

So my football looks also right now different to my football was perhaps six, seven, eight years ago.
